thread.section_title: The Grosvenor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Quite good
thread.title_full: Quite good - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sharaz G
title: Quite good
text: By London standards, a good hotel. Staff are friendly and service-oriented, but there is a lack of attention to detail e.g. maid left a floor cloth in our room; bath robes removed and not replaced -all remedied quickly though. TV set in room was disappointing -very small old-fashioned TV; no digital channels and poor quality signal.
